message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $850000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $750000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
I understand you think the product is pricey, but I believe it's worth every penny. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $800000, but I'm not willing to go any lower. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $780000 for the product. Can you consider my offer?

I understand you're still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm now willing to sell the product to you for $795000. This is my final offer, so I hope you can see the value in this amazing product.
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $785000 for the product. Can you consider my offer?

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for this product. I'm now willing to sell it to you for $790000. This is my last offer, so I hope you can see the value in this amazing product.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $780000 for the product. Can you consider my offer?

I've made concessions and I'm starting to think we're getting too far apart. I'm willing to meet you at $785000, which is the same price you offered in Round 6. I'm not willing to go any lower than this. It's a fair price for a product of this caliber, and I think you'll find it's worth every penny.

I understand that you're not willing to go any lower, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $780000 for the product. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to accept, I'll have to consider buying it from John for $800000.
